headingText: Imana irema isi n'ijuru n'ibirimo byose
Imana ihana inzoka na Adamu na Eva
Nowa yinjira mu nkuge, umwuzūre urimbura abantu
Umwuzure urakama, Nowa asohoka mu nkuge
Aburamu na Sarayi bajya muri Egiputa
Aburamu yizera Uwiteka; Uwiteka amusezeranya isezerano
Aburamu acyura Hagari; na we asuzugura Sarayi, maze Sarayi aramwirukana
Imana ihindura amazina ya Aburamu na Sarayi
Imana ishyiraho gukebwa ho ikimenyetso cy'isezerano ryayo
Imana isezeranya yuko Sara azabyara umuhungu
Imana yongera gusezeranya yuko Sara azabyara umuhungu
Imana ibwira Aburahamu ko igiye kurimbura i Sodomu
Abamarayika bagera i Sodomu; ab'aho babagirira nabi
Abamarayika bakura Loti i Sodomu, Imana iraharimbura
Umwami w'i Gerari acyura Sara, Imana imutegeka kumusubiza Aburahamu
Imana igerageza Aburahamu, imutegeka kuyitambira Isaka
Aburahamu agiye gutamba Isaka, Imana iramubuza
Sara arapfa; Aburahamu agura ubuvumo bwo kumuhambamo
Aburahamu atuma igisonga cye gusabira Isaka umugeni
Isaka yohereza Yakobo i Padanaramu gusabayo umugeni
Yakobo ajya kwa Labani, atendera Rasheli imyaka irindwi
Yakobo atendera Rasheli indi myaka irindwi
Yakobo na Labani basezerana; Labani asubira iwabo
Intumwa za Yakobo zimubwira yuko Esawu aza
Yakobo yuzura na Esawu; agura ubutaka i Shekemu
Shekemu akinda Dina, umukobwa wa Yakobo
Basaza ba Dina bicisha Shekemu n'abe uburiganya
Yosefu atoneshwa na se, bene se bamugirira ishyari
Yuda abyara Perēsi kuri Tamari, umukazana we
Nyirabuja wa Yosefu amwoshya gusambana na we, aranga
Nyirabuja arega Yosefu; bamushyira mu nzu y'imbohe
Yosefu asobanura inzozi z'abatware ba Farawo
Farawo yegurira Yosefu igihugu cya Egiputa
Bene se wa Yosefu baza muri Egiputa guhaha
Bene Yakobo basubira muri Egiputa guhaha
Bajyana na Benyamini; basanga Yosefu mu rugo
Igikombe cya Yosefu kibonwa mu isaho ya Benyamini
Yuda yemera kwitanga ho incungu ya Benyamini
Yosefu agura ibyo Abanyegiputa bafite byose
Yakobo arahiza Yosefu yuko azamuhamba i Kanāni
Yakobo agiye gupfa, Yosefu amuzanira abahungu be bombi
Yakobo asabira Efurayimu na Manase umugisha

Yakobo arapfa baramwosa, bamujyana i Kanāni bamuhambayo
Umwami wa Egiputa atinya Abisirayeli, abagira imbata
Mose aravuka, umukobwa wa Farawo aramurera
Mose yica Umunyegiputa, arahunga ajya i Midiyani
Imana ibonekerera Mose mu gihuru cyaka umuriro
Imana ituma Mose kubwira Farawo ngo areke Abisirayeli
Imana yigisha Mose gukora ibitangaza, ihindura inkoni inzoka
Mose ajya muri Egiputa, akeba umwana we
Farawo agwiza uburetwa bw'Abisirayeli bagaya Mose na Aroni, Mose atakira Uwiteka
Imana yongera kubwira Mose izina ryayo, ikamutuma
Mose na Aroni bakorera imbere ya Farawo cya kimenyetso cy'inkoni
Icyago cya mbere: amazi ahinduka amaraso
Kandi mu gihugu cya Egiputa hose hari bube amaraso, mu mivure y'ibiti no mu bibindi by'amabuye."
Icyago cya kabiri: igihugu cyuzura ibikeri
Mose aburira Farawo ibyo kwicwa kw'abana b'imfura
Icyago cya cumi: abana b'imfura bicwa
Mose abibutsa uko bavuye muri Egiputa
Amategeko yo kwereza Uwiteka imfura zose n'uburiza bwose
Abisirayeli bambuka Inyanja Itukura nko ku butaka, Abanyegiputa bagerageje kubakurikira bararengerwa
Imana ikiza amazi y'i Mara kurura
Babura amazi, Mose akubita igitare kivamo amazi
Abamaleki barwanya Abisirayeli, Mose arabasabira baranesha
Yetiro sebukwe wa Mose amusanga mu butayu
Yetiro agira Mose inama yo gutoranya abacamanza bo kumufasha
Imana yiyerekera Abisirayeli ku musozi wa Sinayi
Uwiteka ahamagara Mose ngo yongere kuzamuka umusozi wa Sinayi

Uwiteka aha Mose abafasha mirongo irindwi

Uwiteka ateza Miriyamu ibibembe, Mose aramusabira
Abatasi cumi na babiri bajya gutata i Kanāni
Icumi rizana inkuru y'incamugongo ya cyo; Kalebu abahana

Kōra, Datani na Abiramu bagoma, barimbuka

Mose na Aroni bakora icyaha, gituma Uwiteka yanga ko bajya i Kanāni

Ibikwiriye kujya bitambwa mu minsi mikuru

Ibyategekewe Abamidiyanikazi, no ku minyago n'isahu
